targets.expr: sum(increase(container_cpu_cfs_throttled_periods_total{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container!=""}[$__rate_interval])) by (container) /sum(increase(container_cpu_cfs_periods_total{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", namespace="$namespace", pod="$pod", container!=""}[$__rate_interval])) by (container)

sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", namespace="$namespace", container!="", image!=""}) by (container, pod)  * on(pod, container) group_left(project_name) esp_project_state{project_name="$project"}
